image.altText: A kettle and a toster on a kitchen bench.

props.synopsis: The good news? Tasmanians can expect $60 credited to their power bills, thanks to the state-owned power company doing well. The bad news? Electricity price rises will absorb most of that.

image.altText: Girl looking sad at playground
